arm_group.description: familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy patients and their relatives

brief_summary.textblock:
Set the Korean Familial Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy (KFHC) registry to study the prevalence
      of gene mutations in Korean patients with familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy

clinical_study.brief_title: Registry and Prevalence of Gene Mutation in Korean Patients With Familial Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. left ventricular maximal wall thickness ≥ 15mm on echocardiography

          2. hypertrophic cardiomyopathy patients' relatives

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. other cardiomyopathy or systemic disease (e.g. fabry disease, danon disease, glycogen
             storage disease)

          2. who deny the study entrance, especially in patients' relatives

study_pop.textblock: familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy patients and their relatives

facility.name: Division of Cardiology, Severance Cardiovascular Hospital, Yonsei University College of Medicine

primary_outcome.description: 1) Identify susceptible genes for familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy in Korean

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: 2) all-cause mortality, hospitalization for heart failure progression, stroke, heart transplantation

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
